title: Mind Body Mechanics Chiropractic
author: Mind Body Mechanics Chiropractic
description: Brought to you by Dr. Tyler Campbell
cleaned_text: At Mind Body Mechanics Chiropractic I provide chiropractic adjustments, and manual therapy to get you back and at it. Patients of all ages are welcome. Email: 66047. Gentle and specific adjustments from head to toe. I use diversified, drops, and traction to adjust the body. I have training in many different modalities of performing soft tissue work to release those tight aching muscles. Flexion and distraction is used to aid the vertebral discs recover from bulges that cause a variety of symptoms. I am here to help you regain your functionality, whether you recently injured yourself, or have chronic pain. I seek to understand what your body is trying to tell you and I by performing orthopedic tests, neurological tests, muscle tests, and range of motion to identify which tissues are the cause. Once the tissue has been identified I will work with your body via the chiropractic adjustment and other physical therapy modalities to help the healing process. Born and raised in Lawrence Kansas, Dr. Tyler Campbell is excited to provide chiropractic care to his hometown. He graduated from Cleveland University-Kansas City with a Bachelor degree in Human Biology and a Doctorate in Chiropractic. In his childhood he had headaches almost daily. Luckily, his mom cleaned for Dr. James Dray who provided chiropractic care to Tyler. He spent many nights amazed by the posters of the different body systems while cleaning Dr. Dray's office with his mom and brothers. From then on Tyler has always been fascinated by the human body and has been headache free.
